Corpora

The following are corpora used for the Digital Humanities section of this project. In the Agony Columns corpus are two decades of agony columns transcribed into raw text using Transkribus, with the date of the column noted in the file name. In the Victorian Novels corpus are 220 novels, some of which are "Newspaper Novels" and some of which are not. At the head of each of these files is metadata, which can also be found in the metadata spreadsheet.
